config.description: This is a set of configuration controls for one channel. Each row corresponds to one channel.
This checkbox represents whether the channel is enabled or not. Disabled channels cannot be used.
This represents the device that is configured on the selected channel, either AD74413R or MAX14906.
This shows the available function for each device. Both devices have their own specific functions.
A 1:1 mapping of the SWIOT board. It will display a route from the selected device to the I/O channel.
After being done with the configuration, this button will switch the board to runtime mode and display the available tools.

max14906.description: The channels configured as MAX14906 will be displayed here, or nothing if there are none. Each channel shows its own controls.
When pressed, the run button starts polling from all channels every second. The values will be plotted in the plot section of each channel.
The config button switches the board to config mode, this will allow setting a different configuration.

ad74413r.description: The plot displays the values read from all channels of AD74413R.
Display the general settings of AD74413R or the advanced settings for each of its channels.
Reads one data buffer from all enabled channels.
Starts the data buffer acquisition continuously.
The config button switches the board to config mode, this will allow setting a different configuration.

faults.description: The hexadecimal raw value read from the device.
Pressing RESET STORED clears the stored part from all fault bits.
All faults can be selected and highlighted. By pressing this button all the highlighted faults will be deselected.
Shows all faults available for this device.
Displays the explanation for all faults available to this device, the explanations get highlighted when the fault bit is active.
Reads the value of the faults once for both devices.
Starts polling the fault values from both devices every second.
The config button switches the board to config mode, this will allow setting a different configuration.
